Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or credible sources to support the assertion that Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith have purchased the BET channel.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the information published by NahaDaily, a known fake news website, is true and accurate.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that BET is owned and operated by Black Entertainment Television, LLC, a subsidiary of Viacom, and there have been no recent announcements about a change of ownership.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the supposed purchase of the BET channel by Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith without any reliable evidence.
